body_html: +1 Also you can just cast it to e.g. int: int(num % x) == y. Though, the bare FizzBuzz doesn't work as given in the example. BTW same behavior on GPU version, so it is unrelated (as expected really).
body_text: +1 Also you can just cast it to e.g. int: int(num % x) == y. Though, the bare FizzBuzz doesn't work as given in the example. BTW same behavior on GPU version, so it is unrelated (as expected really).
body: +1 Also you can just cast it to e.g. int: `int(num % x) == y`. Though, the bare FizzBuzz doesn't work as given in the example. BTW same behavior on GPU version, so it is unrelated (as expected really).
